features: 📷【MULTIFUNCTION MINI CAM】Suitable used for home, office, warehouse, store, backyard, garden, bathroom, bedroom, even in your pocket or on your collar with the clip included. With the internal magnet, upgraded Surveillance cameras can be adsorbed on any iron surfaces easily. One camera can support multiple users and one app can support multiple cameras simultaneously.

📷【Full HD 1080P Camera】 Small mini cam records video in exceptional 1920X1080P HD at 30 frames per second.Real-time Monitor, Infrared Night Vision, 150° Wide Angle, Built-in Magnet, Built-in Rechargeable Battery, Playback/Snapshot/Record, SD Card Recording, Record while Charging,iOS and Android Compatible,only need to download free app.One App Multiple Cameras, One Camera Multiple Users, etc.

📷【Built-in Battery】As A mini WIFI Camera, It built-in 250mah battery, fully charged, can work about 40-60 minutes, Also you can get the camera plugged into a USB charger (or power bank) for recording 24/7 hours. The camera can be connected to WiFi via APP (2.4GHZ only, not 5GHZ)

📷【Built-in Magnet】 Light working distance reach to 5m which makes it perfect as a home security camera or a housekeeper/ nanny cam for recording both snapshot picture and videos without attracting any attention.

📷【24 hours after-sales service】If the product you receive does not meet the description of the listing, please contact us! We will help you solve the problem immediately or refund the full payment or exchange the product within 24 hours!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nanny Camera Mini Hidden Camera UENOKIPS Mini Hidden Camera WiFi Wireless Small Video Camera Full HD 1080P Night Vision Motion Detection Security Nanny Surveillance Cam Covert Cameras with App for Home Indoor Outdoor 24/7 Home Security in Your Hands: Whenever you're using a smartphone/ tablet/ computer device, you can view the HD live streaming by the hidden camera's APP.

This mini nanny camera has a new pixel upgrade, 1080P HD image quality, with a wide angle camera, you can easily cover more areas, and the night image is also fine and clear, the day and night effect is fully upgraded. The camera can be connected to WiFi via APP (2.4GHZ only, not 5GHZ), so you can watch live pictures via APP no matter where you are. You can put this mini camera in your home,office, warehouse,store,garden.It can also be used as a car camcorder, aerial action camera, pet camera, cop camera.

Resolution: 1080P Video Format: AVI Picture Format: JPEG Frame Number: 30fps Visual Angle: 150 degree Recording Range: 5 m2 Compressed Format: H.264 Recording Time: Over 1 hour Charging Time: 2.5 hours Voltage input: DC 5V 1A Interface: MICRO USB Interface Maximum Memory Card Capacity: 128GB (NOT include) The wireless WiFi hidden camera can be easily installed and used by simply downloading the free APP on your mobile phone (Android, IOS) and configuring your router WIFI (2.4GHz only), and the spy camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was difficult to setup this camera at first, as it has issues with wifi, probably the wifi chip that's in here isn't that great. After a few tries, it worked and got it connected to the app. Also, the app requires privacy permissions so if you are comfortable with that, it's the only way to get this camera connected to your phone. The built in small battery in here is useless it would die around 5-10 minutes or so. Better off with a powerbank.Video quality-wise, it's an upscaled 1080p. I wont even consider this as 720p HD, quality is terrible, dark and like an old school 90s webcam. I guess this camera would only be suited for maybe when it's pointed outside where it's bright and sunny. It's not a reliable surveillance amd securty camera.
